QuestData.Title: Justice Long Overdue
QuestData.Description:
You made short work of the Scourge in the Dead Scar, but we've a bigger target to face. It's time to test the mettle of your weapon against Vorath.
Let us finish this, together.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: All of the pieces are in place, now is the time to end this villain.
